overview:
Chris Henchy runs Gary Sanchez Productions, a production company co-founded by comedians Will Ferrell and Adam McKay, which partnered with Sequoia Capital to launch FunnyOrDie.com. Henchy was involved in the creation of the website and is integral in its ongoing commitment to showcase the best comedy on the web.

Henchy has been a writer and producer on such shows as “Entourage”, “Life with Bonnie” and “Spin City”. He also created ABC’s “I’m With Her” and most recently produced a comedy pilot for HBO entitled â€œEast Bound and Down.â€ He has written the feature film “Land of the Lost” for Will Ferrell and Universal Pictures. In 2010, Henchy wrote and produced “The Other Guys” for Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg and Sony Pictures.

Born in New York City, Henchy resides in Los Angeles and New York City, with his wife, actress Brooke Shields, and their two daughters.
